name: prompto
description: Prompt management webapp with Kanban UI

scripts.dev: npm run setup:web && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.electron:dev: npm run setup:electron && concurrently "npm run client" "wait-on http://localhost:3080 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && electron-builder && npm run rebuild:native
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --mac && npm run rebuild:native
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && electron-builder --win && npm run rebuild:native
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && electron-builder --linux && npm run rebuild:native

author: Michele Melis
